#include<bits/stdc++.h> //_Shaffi | (\/) |_|
using namespace std;
#define sc(a) scanf("%d",&a)
#define sl(a) scanf("%lld",&a)
#define f first
#define s second
#define pc(a) printf("%d",a)
#define pl(a) printf("%lld",a)
#define stp(s) cout<<s
#define sp printf(" ")
#define st(s) getline(cin>>ws,s)
#define fo(i,n) for(int i=0;i<n;i++)
#define ed cout<<endl
#define DO int t; scanf("%d",&t); while(t--)
#define pb push_back
typedef unsigned long long int ull;
typedef vector<int> vi;
int main()
{
    int n,t=1,i; sc(n);
    while(n!=0)
    {
        int sum=0,count=0; vector<int>arr;
        for(i=0;i<n;i++)
        {
            int a; sc(a); arr.pb(a);  sum+=a;
        }
        sum=sum/n;
        for(i=0;i<n;i++)
        {
            if(arr[i]!=sum)
            {
                count+=abs(arr[i]-sum);
            }
        }
        cout<<"Set #"<<t<<endl<<"The minimum number of moves is "<<count/2<<"."<<endl;
        sc(n);
        t++;
    }
}
